scripts.test:local:all: OUTPUT_FILE=resulting-timings.json SPLIT_FILE=timings.json SPLIT=1 SPLIT_INDEX=0 cypress run --browser chrome --headless
scripts.test:local:added: OUTPUT_FILE=resulting-timings.json SPLIT_FILE=timings.json SPLIT=1 SPLIT_INDEX=0 cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env CI=true,grepFilterSpecs=true,grepOmitFiltered=true,grepTags="added" --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=cypress-reporter-config.json
scripts.test:local:flaky: OUTPUT_FILE=resulting-timings.json SPLIT_FILE=timings.json SPLIT=1 SPLIT_INDEX=0 cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env CI=true,grepFilterSpecs=true,grepOmitFiltered=true,grepTags="flaky" --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=cypress-reporter-config.json
scripts.test:ci: OUTPUT_FILE=resulting-timings.json SPLIT_FILE=timings.json cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env split=true --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=cypress-reporter-config.json
scripts.test:ci:added: OUTPUT_FILE=resulting-timings.json SPLIT_FILE=timings.json cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env split=true,CI=true,grepFilterSpecs=true,grepOmitFiltered=true,grepTags="added" --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=cypress-reporter-config.json
